capability.name: Sales Product
capability.definition: A representation of a product as sold to a customer, covering the operational fulfillment requirements
capability.role: A sales product defines specific constraints and terms that augment the features of the base product it 'wraps'. It is used to support customization or core products to address specific market needs and opportunities with more narrowly targeted products
capability.example: A bank packages its Current Account product with features suited to students as part of a prospect campaign

key_features.name: Link to core/underlying product instance
key_features.description: Enables link to core/underlying product instance to support a representation of a product as sold to a customer, covering the operational fulfillment requirements

key_features.name: Support specific product constraints/processing terms
key_features.description: Enables support specific product constraints/processing terms to support a representation of a product as sold to a customer, covering the operational fulfillment requirements

key_features.name: Enable/link to additional service features
key_features.description: Enables enable/link to additional service features to support a representation of a product as sold to a customer, covering the operational fulfillment requirements
